snippet: Paulo Wanchope resigned as the coach of Costa Rica’s national team a day after he was involved in a fistfight at a match in Panama City.
abstract: Costa Rica's national men's soccer coach Paulo Wanchope quits after video shows his involvement in scuffle in the stands at Panama City match; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Paulo Wanchope resigned as the coach of Costa Rica’s national team a day after he was involved in a fistfight at a match in Panama City.

headline.main: Costa Rica Coach Quits After Fight
headline.print_headline: Costa Rica Coach Quits After Fight
